Home/ Edith

Edith Baker

Role in the team:

The Negotiator - she talks to the ghosts and hear about their stories. She’s the main talker.
The Host - she has the attic setup; everyone meets at her house.

  • Name: Edith Baker
  • Age: 15
  • Pronouns: she/her
  • Gender: girl
  • Born: April 3rd
  • Orientation: Lesbian

    Physical:

  • Height: 5’1
  • Standout features: freckles
  • Hair: shaggy fluffy shoulder length, black, with a green streak
  • Skin Tone: cool pecan
  • Eyes: forest green, hooded
  • Eyebrows: soft angled, two little slits in left eyebrow
  • Face shape: soft features, round
  • Voice: soft, calm, level

    Style:

  • Clothing: baggy t-shirt, big loose pants, lots of bracelets, kind of messy, big flannel, star necklace
  • Shoes: muddy black converse high-tops with little beads threaded on the laces
  • Piercings: lots of ear piercings and a septum
  • Nails: chipped short black nails
  • Makeup: messy smokey eyeliner

    Personality:

  • Sense of humor: dark, sarcastic
  • Hobbies: tarot, exploring, reading, electric guitar (rarely plays), doodling
  • Biggest Fear: being left behind
  • Confidence level: quite confident
  • Overall personality: sarcastic, funny, silly, likes to joke around, a little impatient, ADHD, smart
  • Habits: leg tapping, picks at fingers, flitting eyes
  • Quirks: always has little scratches - no idea where from
  • Flaws: reckless, stubborn, childish
  • Virtues: level-headed, brave, humorous

Notes:

  • Doesn’t know how to act when someone cries
  • walks fast
  • makes a lot of gay jokes
  • finger guns
  • zones out
  • scatter-brained
  • REALLY bad handwriting
  • impulsively dyes her hair at 1 am
